band-intro: Formed in Erlangen in 2022, Cumbia Tu Mare was born from the union of several Latin friends with a shared passion for music. Since then, we've embarked on an exciting journey, attracting talented musicians from various nationalities and creating a unique blend of musical styles and flavors.
band-intro-1: Click on our pictures to learn more about us.
